snippet.title: How To Code In Java
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast
- Code java with Eclipse and code your very first java program!

🌅 Source code - https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Strings/HelloWorld.java

This is how to create a hello world program in java using eclipse. This java programming tutorial for beginners is made for absolute beginners who have no programming experience and want to learn how to code java. Java is a very widely used programming language used for everything from apps to AI. Learning how to code Java can be intimidating, but I try to break it down to help all of you new/self-taught programmers out there! 

NOTES: https://docs.google.com/document/d/109mnfbqleVEGxjOZ1lWLJkwnDhF9eA2R0Cu3VrjfQ9k/edit?usp=sharing

Here is the Java code we will write today:
System.out.println("Hello world");

Install Eclipse on Mac:
1.https://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/release/photon/r/eclipse-ide-java-and-dsl-developers

Install Eclipse on Windows:
1.https://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/release/photon/r/eclipse-ide-java-and-dsl-developers (This link is slightly different from the one in video, use this one instead)
2.http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html

Coding is nothing more than a to-do list for a computer. I hope to save you time and take the confusion out of coding, by teaching you helpful pieces of code you can use for your own programs.These tutorials are a way to try to help people save time and frustration when coding. I'VE BEEN THERE, it's 2018... let's make code easier, and beautiful.

I hope this video about how to code java! If this java programming tutorial helped you get started, please like this video so I know to make more!

Why do you want to learn how to write java code for beginners? Join the conversation by adding a comment down below! -

7 Tips on How To Think Like a Programmer: https://manychat.com/l2/102224234605534
New Programmer Support: https://www.facebook.com/groups/616837729085352
Java Students Unite: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2414953521949898/

10% off merch: https://teespring.com/i-have-no-idea-what-do-2020?pr=sysout10

Recommended Channels to Subscribe to:

TheNewBoston: https://www.youtube.com/user/thenewboston

Keyboard: https://amzn.to/3ca4zlP

~

Alex Lee
